entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Indin River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:44 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 30.
